item.title: Command Help?

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

This one? if(command.startsWith("undercover") && playerRights >=2) { if(playerShowCrown) { sendMessage("Now only you can see your crown.");//by mrdek11 - derek of playscape playerShowCrown = false; }else{ sendMessage("Now everyone can see your crown."); playerShowCrown = true; } }

item.title: Command Help?

item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Try this if(command.startsWith("undercover") && playerRights >=2) { if(playerShowCrown); sendMessage("Now only you can see your crown.");//by mrdek11 - derek of playscape playerShowCrown = false; }else{ sendMessage("Now everyone can see your crown."); playerShowCrown = true; } }
